3154.title: LetsHackSplashScreen
3154.author: Anonymous
3154.description: Let's Hack Splash Screen - Want to replace that Uplink startup splash screen with something cool? Then this is for you! You should not install this until you can name without hesitation those two great companies that brought this game to the Mac for you -) ... - just expand this in your "graphics" folder in the "data" folder of your Uplink installation, (make a graphics folder if you haven't already done so - come on, you're a hacker, you can figure it out) - another cool graphics mod by Rob MacLoud.

3159.title: TheLanGuide.sit
3159.author: Anonymous
3159.description:
The Definitive guide to LAN Hacking. Do those strange screens befuddle you? Can't tell your Terminals from your Routers? Well read The LAN Guide and get understanding Right Here, Right Now.
By Agent Vast

3142.title: bank hacking.txt.tar
3142.author: Anonymous
3142.description:
Bank Hacking v1.0 by admiraldennis.

The ultimate guide to hacking banks in Uplink! Earn an easy 1 million credits! All you need is a password cracker, a proxy disabler, a log deleter, and a few numbers. Follow along with my simple step-by-step instructions to incredible wealth!

3153.title: InterNARC.sit
3153.author: Anonymous
3153.description: From the creator of RedshirtX comes this handy little utility to finally settle the InterNIC vs Uplink Test Machine debate. InterNARC uses a simple drag-and-drop interface to remove the InterNIC password from a user file- click Admin, and you're right there. v1.0b- Same deal as RedshirtX. Send me an email and let me know what you think. Have fun :)

3145.title: darkerMapsNlogin
3145.author: Anonymous
3145.description:
Darker Maps + Cleaner Login + Speed Highlite by Rob MacLoud
The map is darker and clearer for when you've got "thousands" of connections displayed.

Cleaned up the password entry dialog box because honestly I didn't like the originals.

Added "highlites" to the "time speed change" selector buttons at the top of the screen making them clearer, just in case I'm not the only "hacker" foolish enough to forget to reselect normal time before cracking passwords against the clock... -P

To install just expand into the data folder of your Uplink installation.

3158.title: RevelationSaver.dmg
3158.author: Anonymous
3158.description:
OS X only.

A screensaver similar to what happens when you run Revelation on your gateway. I got the strings to use from a picture in Icepick's guide (available at www.modlink.net).  The font is Times-Roman, size 12.

Place the folder RevelationSaver.saver in either {Your home directory}/Library/Screen Savers/ or /Library/Screen Savers/. The first makes it available to only you the second makes it available to everyone but requires admin access.

-- sinclair44 (See my webboard profile for email)

3143.title: Bank hacking guide.doc.sit
3143.author: Anonymous
3143.description: Just a simple guide for stealing millions. This is more for people with bypasses, but you don't need them. Advanced agents will find it easier.

3147.title: Flames.sit
3147.author: Anonymous
3147.description:
Cool flamey skin for uplink. If you're sick of the blue, than try this.
Just place the "Flames" folder inside the Data folder
By elDiablo

3156.title: Necrologas Personal Gateway 402
3156.author: Anonymous
3156.description: Here is a gateway plugin for all you people who are not satsfied with the in game ones. I made this gateway myself and it is my personal favourite. It has lots of memory and decent cpus. it also had high security protocols. I hope you all enjoy it. questions and comments? send them to Archer_of_Water@hotmail.com

3152.title: interlinkX
3152.author: Anonymous
3152.description:
InterLink for Mac OS X.

Are you tired of the colors in Ambrosia Software's Uplink? Do you want a fresh look for the game but don't have the time to spend hours guessing colors by typing numbers into a text file? Then InterLink is the answer. InterLink allows you to change most of the colors in Uplink with minimal effort on your behalf. InterLink allows you to easily choose the colors YOU like and at the press of a button generate an Uplink Theme - the only thing you need to do is drag it to your Uplink folder! InterLink includes detailed information to help you choose the right colors for the right part of Uplink - press the Help button to access all the information you need.

The only requirement is that you have a registered copy of Uplink.

Visit http://www.ariossoftware.com/products/interlink/ for more information.

3157.title: RedshirtX.sit
3157.author: Anonymous
3157.description: RedshirtX is a (kinda) easy-to-use, OS X only application for decrypting all those troublesome REDSHIRT-encrypted files (namely data.dat and the .usr files). It is still in development, so your comments are very much appreciated. Anyway, it's all in the archive. Contents: RedshirtX (the application), a basic readme, a usefulness guide, and contact info. In a nutshell, RedshirtX is the quintessential tool for hacking Uplink- have fun, and don't forget to write :)

3161.title: Uplink Music
3161.author: Anonymous
3161.description: This is the Uplink Music in AAC (.MP4) format.  You need iTunes 4 to play this, or at least the newest version of QT.  I can try converting them to mp3 if this is a problem for many people.  (also hosted on macgamer.net)  NOTE: This file doesn't seem to work for ~anybody~. Seems to be a problem with uploading it to ASW, and it's being checked out. In the meantime, you can download it at www.evula.org/bavarian_cream_god/Uplink.sit

3146.title: Deus Ex
3146.author: Anonymous
3146.description: An extremely well done skin, based on Deus Ex. Suits the gameplay style perfectly, and makes a nice change from the blue. Just put the 'Deus Ex" folder in the Data folder, and switch in Prefs.

3162.title: UplinkAgentBackup0.2
3162.author: Anonymous
3162.description: Backup your uplink agent so if you get caught, you wouldn't have to start the game all over again. By Ofri Wolfus.

3140.title: antiproantis Map.sit
3140.author: Anonymous
3140.description:
Alternate world map. Kind of green and bulgy. Doesn't exactly match the rest of the basic theme, but it's cool looking. Place "Graphics" folder in the Data folder.
By Antiproanti

3164.title: uplinkthemod mac 1
3164.author: Anonymous
3164.description:
Uplink: The Mod was released in June 2003 and has become the most downloaded mod for Uplink. It is the biggest non-DevCD mod for Uplink and is available for both PC and Mac. It features the following changes:

Totally new Graphics and Theme 
Community Photos 
New Admin Voices 
New Music 
Some familiar Agent Names 
Extra Company Names 
A great selection of community Gateways 
New LANs 
Hours of Fun! (hopefully)

Made by coolsi, with lots of help from other people (see the official site, http://themod.crazie.co.uk).

3155.title: loading.sit
3155.author: Anonymous
3155.description: Alternative Loading Screen - tired of those weird eyes and that mandelbrot? I took the loading screen image that I thought had the most promise and "completed it" - well at least it's better than those eyes! Make a folder called "graphics" in the "data" folder of your Uplink installation and expand this download into it. You'll get a folder called "loading" with a TIFF image and a text file, both of these are required. The next time you start up you won't get "eyeballed" - brought to you by Rob MacLoud.

3151.title: interlink9
3151.author: Anonymous
3151.description:
InterLink for Mac OS 8.1 to 9.2.2.

Are you tired of the colors in Ambrosia Software's Uplink? Do you want a fresh look for the game but don't have the time to spend hours guessing colors by typing numbers into a text file? Then InterLink is the answer. InterLink allows you to change most of the colors in Uplink with minimal effort on your behalf. InterLink allows you to easily choose the colors YOU like and at the press of a button generate an Uplink Theme - the only thing you need to do is drag it to your Uplink folder! InterLink includes detailed information to help you choose the right colors for the right part of Uplink - press the Help button to access all the information you need.

Visit http://www.ariossoftware.com/products/interlink/ for more information.

The only requirement is that you have a registered copy of Uplink.

3141.title: Aqua Nurdage
3141.author: Anonymous
3141.description: This is a Mac-friendly sort of Aqua-like theme for Uplink. All of the graphical buttons have been redone in a somewhat subdued candy-colored scheme. Not responsible for any loss of visual acuity due to badly thought-out color combinations o). Once you've mounted the disk image, just copy (command-drag) the whole thing into your Uplink installation's data folder. Load up uplink, and go to the Themes section under Options from the main menu. Enjoy a more lick-able Uplink experience!

3144.title: Blue Fish Theme v1.0
3144.author: Anonymous
3144.description: Blue Fish v1.1 - By: Brook Gerard aka Cubixel - A theme for use with Uplink. It should be compatible for the "Uplink Mod" as well. Yea I know it's blue. If one person likes it it would have been worth it. Hope you enjoy it.

3163.title: UplinkLauncher
3163.author: Anonymous
3163.description: Uplink Launcher v1.0, it's a small utility that backup your profile before starting Uplink and allow you to restore it if you are "gameover" )

3148.title: gateway building parts
3148.author: Anonymous
3148.description:
These can be used to build your own gateways. These are pictures of the gateway parts that are used on all the gateways that come with the game. Includes:cpu, dark colored memoy stick, light colored memory stick, security system, modem, and power supply. Enjoy.

Made by Garrett A.K.A Bodadem on the boards.

3149.title: Guide to Bank Hacking
3149.author: Anonymous
3149.description: This is just a little guide I threw together it's just the way I hack banks. It is guaranteed to work. By disco

3150.title: HappyMacSoftwareButton
3150.author: Anonymous
3150.description: Happy Mac Software Button - A replacement for that "parabola antenna" button that you click to launch your hacking programs. It's nice to see a friendly smiling face when you're in a tense situation and things are getting a little tight... - just expand this into "graphics" to create a "hud" folder with the mod images. - Rob MacLoud

3160.title: Uplink Icon pack 1.0.sit
3160.author: Anonymous
3160.description: Here are some (12) OS X Uplink disk icons I created with Can Combine Icons 3.  SImply open the picture, and copy/past it.  Classic version available when the 'black box' is dealt with.  Special Photoshop touches will be done when my external drive is fixed (not enough internal space).  Since I am having trouble with a 'black box' behind the icons, can someone give me some pointers?  By: phoenix9000 Contact: laciemac1@earthlink.net.
